Html:
Set-ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted

Can I put it back to RemoteSigned now?

Yes, but alternatively you can "unblock" the downloaded ps1 script by right-clicking it, properties, then hitting the "unblock" button. All executable scripts downloaded are marked this way by IE (xp-sp2 and after) - even though the file is local, it is treated by powershell as "remote" until you unblock it.
